mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.logistics_code AS "logisticsCode", a.logistics_name AS "logisticsName", a.warehouse_code AS "warehouseCode", a.warehouse_name AS "warehouseName", a.distinct_code AS "distinctCode", a.distinct_name AS "distinctName", a.commodity_code AS "commodityCode", a.commodity_name AS "commodityName", a.s_flag AS "sFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oms_logistics_goods( id, logistics_code, logistics_name, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, distinct_code, distinct_name, commodity_code, commodity_name, s_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{logisticsCode}, #{logisticsName}, #{warehouseCode}, #{warehouseName}, #{distinctCode}, #{distinctName}, #{commodityCode}, #{commodityName}, #{sFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oms_logistics_goods SET logistics_code = #{logisticsCode}, logistics_name = #{logisticsName}, warehouse_code = #{warehouseCode}, warehouse_name = #{warehouseName}, distinct_code = #{distinctCode}, distinct_name = #{distinctName}, commodity_code = #{commodityCode}, commodity_name = #{commodityName}, s_flag = #{sFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
